My new year's resolution: not having one! I am sick and tired of the self improvement, getting things done etc frenzy off our present time!
no pain, no gain! Quitting my job as an English teacher 1 and a half years ago was still the right thing to do in hindsight!
2008. A year of unemployment, then underpayment and finally pastures new in the academic arena is finally drawing to a close. Thank god!
